links.title: Stocks making the biggest move premarket: TSLA, UAL, TWTR, NFLX & more
links.description: Tesla - CEO Elon Musk said in a blog post that the automaker will remain a public company, following consideration of his proposal to go private. Musk said he was confident the deal could have been funded, but said Tesla shareholders told him they wanted the company to remain public.

links.description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets mobile communication and media devices, personal computers, watches, and portable digital music players worldwide, including iPhone, iPad, Mac, iPod, Apple TV, and more. links.title: Expected Market Moves For Week Ending 8/31/2018
links.description: The expected move that a stock makes is very important to know. The easiest way to get an idea of the move is to price a straddle at the close of trading on Friday. That is buying one call and one put at an ATM strike.
